ama_test,40,114,5	script	Upper Headgear	731,{
	.@menu$ = getvariableofnpc( .alphabet_menu$, "headgear_seller_creation" );
	if (.@menu$ == "") {
		mes "[Headgear Seller]";
		mes "I am sorry, it seems like something went wrong.";
		mes "I cannot find any Headgear in our database at the moment.";
		mes "Please contact a game master.";
		close;
	}
	mes "[Headgear Seller]";
	mes "Welcome!";
	mes "I can sell you any Headgear in the game. Would you like to have a look?";
	next;
	.@s = select(.@menu$) -1;
	close2;
	callshop "uheadgear_mob#"+ getvariableofnpc( .alphabet$[.@s], "headgear_seller_creation" ), 1;
	end;
}

-	script	headgear_seller_creation	-1,{
	end;
OnInit:
	if (checkre(0)) {
		.@item_db$ = "(SELECT * FROM item_db_re UNION ALL SELECT * FROM item_db2_re) AS combined_item_db";
	} else {
		.@item_db$ = "(SELECT * FROM item_db UNION ALL SELECT * FROM item_db2) AS combined_item_db";
	}
	
	// Define the list of item IDs to exclude from the shop (comma-separated)
	.@exclude_ids$ = "5688,18831,18610,18879,5870,5919,5606,18934,18715,18758,18792,5943,5871,5689,5774,18622,18623,18624,18625,18803,5761,18872,18661,18898"; // Add item IDs here

	freeloop 1;
	.@group = 0;
	.@size_alphabet = 0;
	.@total = query_sql( "SELECT `combined_item_db`.`id`, `combined_item_db`.`price_buy` FROM "+ .@item_db$ +" WHERE `type` = 'Armor' AND `location_head_top` = 1 AND `name_english` NOT LIKE 'eden' AND `id` NOT IN ("+ .@exclude_ids$ +") ORDER BY `name_english`;", .@id,.@price_buy );	
	for ( .@i = 0; .@i < .@total; .@i++ ) {
		.@new = (.@i) / 100 + 1;
		if(.@group != .@new){
			.@group = .@new;
			.alphabet$[.@size_alphabet++] = .@group;
			.alphabet_menu$ = .alphabet_menu$ +"Headgear "+.@group+ ":";
			npcshopdelitem "uheadgear_mob#"+ .@group, 501;
		}
		.@price = 1000000;
		if (.@price_buy[.@i] > 20)
			.@price = .@price_buy[.@i];
		npcshopadditem "uheadgear_mob#"+ .@group, .@id[.@i], .@price;
	}
	freeloop 0;
	end;
}
-	shop	uheadgear_mob#1	-1,501:1000
-	shop	uheadgear_mob#2	-1,501:1000
-	shop	uheadgear_mob#3	-1,501:1000
-	shop	uheadgear_mob#4	-1,501:1000
-	shop	uheadgear_mob#5	-1,501:1000
-	shop	uheadgear_mob#6	-1,501:1000

-	shop	uheadgear_mob#12	-1,501:1000
-	shop	uheadgear_mob#13	-1,501:1000
-	shop	uheadgear_mob#14	-1,501:1000
-	shop	uheadgear_mob#15	-1,501:1000

ama_test,44,114,5	script	Middle Headgear	899,{
	.@menu$ = getvariableofnpc( .alphabet_menu$, "mheadgear_seller_creation" );
	if (.@menu$ == "") {
		mes "[Middle Headgear Seller]";
		mes "I am sorry, it seems like something went wrong.";
		mes "I cannot find any Headgear in our database at the moment.";
		mes "Please contact a game master.";
		close;
	}
	mes "[Middle Headgear Seller]";
	mes "Welcome!";
	mes "I can sell you any Headgear in the game. Would you like to have a look?";
	next;
	.@s = select(.@menu$) -1;
	close2;
	callshop "mheadgear_mob#"+ getvariableofnpc( .alphabet$[.@s], "mheadgear_seller_creation" ), 1;
	end;
}

-	script	mheadgear_seller_creation	-1,{
	end;
OnInit:
	if (checkre(0)) {
		.@item_db$ = "(SELECT * FROM item_db_re UNION ALL SELECT * FROM item_db2_re) AS combined_item_db";
	} else {
		.@item_db$ = "(SELECT * FROM item_db UNION ALL SELECT * FROM item_db2) AS combined_item_db";
	}
	
	// Define the list of item IDs to exclude from the shop (comma-separated)
	.@exclude_ids$ = "19155,18846"; // Add item IDs here

	freeloop 1;
	.@group = 0;
	.@size_alphabet = 0;
	.@total = query_sql( "SELECT `combined_item_db`.`id`, `combined_item_db`.`price_buy` FROM "+ .@item_db$ +" WHERE `type` = 'Armor' AND `location_head_mid` = 1 AND `name_english` NOT LIKE 'eden' AND `id` NOT IN ("+ .@exclude_ids$ +") ORDER BY `name_english`;", .@id,.@price_buy );	
	for ( .@i = 0; .@i < .@total; .@i++ ) {
		.@new = (.@i) / 100 + 1;
		if(.@group != .@new){
			.@group = .@new;
			.alphabet$[.@size_alphabet++] = .@group;
			.alphabet_menu$ = .alphabet_menu$ +" Middle Headgear "+.@group+ ":";
			npcshopdelitem "mheadgear_mob#"+ .@group, 501;
		}
		.@price = 1000000;
		if (.@price_buy[.@i] > 20)
			.@price = .@price_buy[.@i];
		npcshopadditem "mheadgear_mob#"+ .@group, .@id[.@i], .@price;
	}
	freeloop 0;
	end;
}
-	shop	mheadgear_mob#1	-1,501:1000
-	shop	mheadgear_mob#2	-1,501:1000
-	shop	mheadgear_mob#3	-1,501:1000
-	shop	mheadgear_mob#4	-1,501:1000
-	shop	mheadgear_mob#5	-1,501:1000
-	shop	mheadgear_mob#6	-1,501:1000
-	shop	mheadgear_mob#7	-1,501:1000
-	shop	mheadgear_mob#8	-1,501:1000
-	shop	mheadgear_mob#9	-1,501:1000
ama_test,46,114,5	script	Lower Headgear	853,{
	.@menu$ = getvariableofnpc( .alphabet_menu$, "lheadgear_seller_creation" );
	if (.@menu$ == "") {
		mes "[Lower Headgear Seller]";
		mes "I am sorry, it seems like something went wrong.";
		mes "I cannot find any Headgear in our database at the moment.";
		mes "Please contact a game master.";
		close;
	}
	mes "[Lower Headgear Seller]";
	mes "Welcome!";
	mes "I can sell you any Headgear in the game. Would you like to have a look?";
	next;
	.@s = select(.@menu$) -1;
	close2;
	callshop "lheadgear_mob#"+ getvariableofnpc( .alphabet$[.@s], "lheadgear_seller_creation" ), 1;
	end;
}

-	script	lheadgear_seller_creation	-1,{
	end;
OnInit:
	if (checkre(0)) {
		.@item_db$ = "(SELECT * FROM item_db_re UNION ALL SELECT * FROM item_db2_re) AS combined_item_db";
	} else {
		.@item_db$ = "(SELECT * FROM item_db UNION ALL SELECT * FROM item_db2) AS combined_item_db";
	}
	
	// Define the list of item IDs to exclude from the shop (comma-separated)
	.@exclude_ids$ = "5054,5868,19004,18906"; // Add item IDs here

	freeloop 1;
	.@group = 0;
	.@size_alphabet = 0;
	.@total = query_sql( "SELECT `combined_item_db`.`id`, `combined_item_db`.`price_buy` FROM "+ .@item_db$ +" WHERE `type` = 'Armor' AND `location_head_low` = 1 AND `name_english` NOT LIKE 'eden' AND `id` NOT IN ("+ .@exclude_ids$ +") ORDER BY `name_english`;", .@id,.@price_buy );	
	for ( .@i = 0; .@i < .@total; .@i++ ) {
		.@new = (.@i) / 100 + 1;
		if(.@group != .@new){
			.@group = .@new;
			.alphabet$[.@size_alphabet++] = .@group;
			.alphabet_menu$ = .alphabet_menu$ +" Lower Headgear "+.@group+ ":";
			npcshopdelitem "lheadgear_mob#"+ .@group, 501;
		}
		.@price = 1000000;
		if (.@price_buy[.@i] > 20)
			.@price = .@price_buy[.@i];
		npcshopadditem "lheadgear_mob#"+ .@group, .@id[.@i], .@price;
	}
	freeloop 0;
	end;
}
-	shop	lheadgear_mob#1	-1,501:1000
-	shop	lheadgear_mob#2	-1,501:1000
-	shop	lheadgear_mob#3	-1,501:1000
-	shop	lheadgear_mob#4	-1,501:1000
-	shop	lheadgear_mob#5	-1,501:1000
-	shop	lheadgear_mob#6	-1,501:1000
-	shop	lheadgear_mob#7	-1,501:1000
-	shop	lheadgear_mob#8	-1,501:1000
-	shop	lheadgear_mob#9	-1,501:1000
